US actress Amber Heard will pay Johnny Depp $1m (£820,000) in a settlement of their defamation suit, lawyers for Mr Depp told the BBC.
The former couple faced off in court this spring in a high-prof… [+1909 chars]

articles.title: Molly-Mae Hague shows off £193k ‘dream car’ after waiting a year to buy it... - The Sun
articles.description: Molly-Mae Hague has revealed her brand new £193,000 dream car. The mum-to-be waited a year to get behind the wheel of her Mercedes-AMG G 63 Magno Edition having upgraded from a Range Rover. In her …
